verses.verse: Then the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Tell <WH1696> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to raise <WH3947> a contribution <WH8641> for Me; from every <WH3605> man <WH376> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> moves <WH5068> him you shall raise <WH3947> My contribution. <WH8641>
"And this <WH2088> is the contribution <WH8641> which <WH834> you are to raise <WH3947> from them: gold, <WH2091> silver <WH3701> and bronze, <WH5178>
blue, <WH8504> purple <WH713> and scarlet <WH8144> [material,] fine <WH8336> linen, <WH8336> goat <WH5795> [hair,]
rams' skins <WH5785> dyed <WH119> red, <WH119> porpoise <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086>
oil <WH8081> for lighting, <WH3974> spices <WH1314> for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> and for the fragrant <WH5561> incense, <WH7004>
onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68> and setting <WH4394> stones, <WH68> for the ephod <WH646> and for the breastpiece. <WH2833>
"And let them construct <WH6213> a sanctuary <WH4720> for Me, that I may dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> them.

"According to all <WH3605> that I am going to show <WH7200> you, [as] the pattern <WH8403> of the tabernacle <WH4908> and the pattern <WH8403> of all <WH3605> its furniture, <WH3627> just so <WH3651> you shall construct <WH6213> [it.]

"And they shall construct <WH6213> an ark <WH727> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086> two and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> long, <WH753> and one and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> wide, <WH7341> and one and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> high. <WH6967>

"And you shall overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> inside <WH4480> <WH1004> and out you shall overlay <WH6823> it, and you shall make <WH6213> a gold <WH2091> molding <WH2213> around <WH5439> it.

"And you shall cast <WH3332> four <WH702> gold <WH2091> rings <WH2885> for it, and fasten <WH5414> them on its four <WH702> feet, <WH6471> and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> shall be on one <WH259> side <WH6763> of it and two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on the other <WH8145> side <WH6763> of it.
"And you shall make <WH6213> poles <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086> and overlay <WH6823> them with gold. <WH2091>
"And you shall put <WH935> the poles <WH905> into the rings <WH2885> on the sides <WH6763> of the ark, <WH727> to carry <WH5375> the ark <WH727> with them.
"The poles <WH905> shall remain <WH1961> in the rings <WH2885> of the ark; <WH727> they shall not be removed <WH5493> from it.
"And you shall put <WH5414> into the ark <WH727> the testimony <WH5715> which <WH834> I shall give <WH5414> you.

"And you shall make <WH6213> a mercy <WH3727> seat <WH3727> of pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> two and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> long <WH753> and one and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> wide. <WH7341>

"And you shall make <WH6213> two <WH8147> cherubim <WH3742> of gold, <WH2091> make <WH6213> them of hammered <WH4749> work <WH4749> at the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the mercy <WH3727> seat. <WH3727>

"And make <WH6213> one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> at one <WH2088> end <WH7098> and one <WH259> cherub <WH3742> at the other <WH259> end; <WH7098> you shall make <WH6213> the cherubim <WH3742> [of one piece] with the mercy <WH3727> seat <WH3727> at its two <WH8147> ends. <WH7098>

"And the cherubim <WH3742> shall have <WH1961> [their] wings <WH3671> spread <WH6566> upward, <WH4605> covering <WH5526> the mercy <WH3727> seat <WH3727> with their wings <WH3671> and facing <WH6440> <WH413> one <WH376> another; <WH251> the faces <WH6440> of the cherubim <WH3742> are to be [turned] toward <WH413> the mercy <WH3727> seat. <WH3727>

"And you shall put <WH5414> the mercy <WH3727> seat <WH3727> on top <WH4605> of the ark, <WH727> and in the ark <WH727> you shall put <WH5414> the testimony <WH5715> which <WH834> I shall give <WH5414> to you.

"And there <WH8033> I will meet <WH3259> with you; and from above <WH5921> the mercy <WH3727> seat, <WH3727> from between <WH996> the two <WH8147> cherubim <WH3742> which <WH834> are upon the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> I will speak <WH1696> to you about all <WH3605> that I will give <WH6680> you in commandment <WH6680> for the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

"And you shall make <WH6213> a table <WH7979> of acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> two <WH8147> cubits <WH520> long <WH753> and one cubit <WH520> wide <WH7341> and one and a half <WH2677> cubits <WH520> high. <WH6967>
"And you shall overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> and make <WH6213> a gold <WH2091> border <WH2213> around <WH5439> it.
"And you shall make <WH6213> for it a rim <WH4526> of a handbreadth <WH2948> around <WH5439> [it;] and you shall make <WH6213> a gold <WH2091> border <WH2213> for the rim <WH4526> around <WH5439> it.
"And you shall make <WH6213> four <WH702> gold <WH2091> rings <WH2885> for it and put <WH5414> rings <WH2885> on the four <WH702> corners <WH6285> which <WH834> are on its four <WH702> feet. <WH7272>
"The rings <WH2885> shall be close <WH5980> to the rim <WH4526> as holders <WH1004> for the poles <WH905> to carry <WH5375> the table. <WH7979>
"And you shall make <WH6213> the poles <WH905> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086> and overlay <WH6823> them with gold, <WH2091> so that with them the table <WH7979> may be carried. <WH5375>

"And you shall make <WH6213> its dishes <WH7086> and its pans <WH3709> and its jars <WH7184> and its bowls, <WH4518> with which <WH834> to pour <WH5258> libations; <WH5258> you shall make <WH6213> them of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>
"And you shall set <WH5414> the bread <WH3899> of the Presence <WH6440> on the table <WH7979> before <WH6440> Me at all <WH8548> times. <WH8548>

"Then you shall make <WH6213> a lampstand <WH4501> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091> The lampstand <WH4501> [and] its base <WH3409> and its shaft <WH7070> are to be made <WH6213> of hammered <WH4749> work; <WH4749> its cups, <WH1375> its bulbs <WH3730> and its flowers <WH6525> shall be [of one piece] with it.

"And six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> shall go <WH3318> out from its sides; <WH6654> three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the lampstand <WH4501> from its one <WH259> side, <WH6654> and three <WH7969> branches <WH7070> of the lampstand <WH4501> from its other <WH8145> side. <WH6654>

"Three <WH7969> cups <WH1375> [shall be] shaped <WH8246> like <WH8246> almond <WH8246> [blossoms] in the one <WH259> branch, <WH7070> a bulb <WH3730> and a flower, <WH6525> and three <WH7969> cups <WH1375> shaped <WH8246> like <WH8246> almond <WH8246> [blossoms] in the other <WH259> branch, <WH7070> a bulb <WH3730> and a flower <WH6525> â€“ so <WH3651> for six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> going <WH3318> out from the lampstand; <WH4501>
and in the lampstand <WH4501> four <WH702> cups <WH1375> shaped <WH8246> like <WH8246> almond <WH8246> [blossoms,] its bulbs <WH3730> and its flowers. <WH6525>

"And a bulb <WH3730> shall be under <WH8478> the [first] pair <WH8147> of branches <WH7070> [coming <WH3318>] out of it, and a bulb <WH3730> under <WH8478> the [second] pair <WH8147> of branches <WH7070> [coming] out of it, and a bulb <WH3730> under <WH8478> the [third] pair <WH8147> of branches <WH7070> [coming] out of it, for the six <WH8337> branches <WH7070> coming out of the lampstand. <WH4501>
"Their bulbs <WH3730> and their branches <WH7070> [shall be of one <WH259> piece] with it; all <WH3605> of it shall be one piece of hammered <WH4749> work <WH4749> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>

"Then you shall make <WH6213> its lamps <WH5216> seven <WH7651> [in number;] and they shall mount <WH5927> its lamps <WH5216> so as to shed <WH215> light <WH215> on the space <WH5676> in front <WH6440> of it.
"And its snuffers <WH4457> and their trays <WH4289> [shall be] of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>
"It shall be made <WH6213> from a talent <WH3603> of pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> with all <WH3605> these <WH428> utensils. <WH3627>
"And see <WH7200> that you make <WH6213> [them] after the pattern <WH8403> for them, which <WH834> was shown <WH7200> to you on the mountain. <WH2022>
